event_description: 9/11 terrorist attacks on United States
source_notes: Global economic uncertainty and reduced air travel

event_description: US-led invasion of Iraq begins
Hurricane Katrina hits US Gulf Coast
source_notes: Disrupted US oil production and refining

event_description: Oil prices reach all-time high of $147/barrel
Lehman Brothers bankruptcy - Global Financial Crisis
OPEC cuts production by 4.2 million bpd
source_notes: Response to financial crisis price collapse

event_description: Arab Spring - Libyan civil war begins
OPEC decides not to cut production despite oversupply
OPEC maintains production levels, leading to price collapse
Iran nuclear deal signed - sanctions relief
OPEC+ agrees to cut production by 1.8 million bpd
US withdraws from Iran nuclear deal, reimposes sanctions
Drone attacks on Saudi Aramco facilities
OPEC+ production cut talks collapse
source_notes: Price war between Saudi Arabia and Russia

event_description: COVID-19 declared global pandemic
US oil futures go negative for first time
OPEC+ agrees to record 9.7 million bpd production cut
OPEC+ maintains gradual production increase plan
Russia invades Ukraine
OPEC+ announces 2 million bpd production cut
Israel-Hamas conflict begins
